EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Thank you for your order
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Thank you for purchasing from us. You purchased: {{product.name}}. If you have any problems, please contact us.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Thank you for purchasing from us. You purchased: {{product.name}}. If you have any problems, please contact us.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Your software license has been suspended.
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your product has been suspended due to an outstanding balance on your account. Please visit our website to make payment to re-activate your product before it is terminated.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your product has been suspended due to an outstanding balance on your account. Please visit our website to make payment to re-activate your product before it is terminated.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}

EmailTemplateTranslation.subject: Your software license has been terminated
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your product has been terminated due to non-payment. A notice was previusly sent, warning that your product would be terminated if payment was not made.

If you feel you have recieved this email in error, please contact us as soon as possible for assistance.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.html_body:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your product has been terminated due to non-payment. A notice was previusly sent, warning that your product would be terminated if payment was not made.

If you feel you have recieved this email in error, please contact us as soon as possible for assistance.

{{{settings.mail.email_signature_html}}}
EmailTemplateTranslation.plaintext_body_default:
Dear {{client.first_name}} {{client.last_name}},

Your product has been terminated due to non-payment. A notice was previusly sent, warning that your license would be terminated if payment was not made.

If you feel you have recieved this email in error, please contact us as soon as possible for assistance.

{{settings.mail.email_signature_plaintext}}
